def contains_clothes_needing_ironing(basket: item):
    # Define a function to check if the basket contains clothes needing ironing
    symbol has_clothes=exists clothes: item : is_clothes(clothes) and inside(clothes, basket)
    return has_clothes

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists basket: item : is_basket_for_clothes(basket) and contains_clothes_needing_ironing(
basket):
            # Check if there is a known basket with clothes needing ironing
            bind basket: item where:
                is_basket_for_clothes(basket) and contains_clothes_needing_ironing(basket)
            # Select a basket that has clothes needing ironing
            achieve close_char(char, basket)
            # Move the character closer to the basket with clothes needing ironing
        else:
            # If no known basket is found, check unvisited baskets
            foreach basket: item:
                if is_basket_for_clothes(basket) and not visited(basket):
                    observe(basket, "Check if there are clothes needing ironing in the basket")
